description: The latest arrests take the total to 20 following reports of violent disorder in the Fens.
title: Four further arrests over hare coursing in Cambridgeshire
title_page: Four further arrests over hare coursing in Cambridgeshire - BBC News
maintext:
A further four people have been arrested on suspicion of violent disorder and hare coursing in Cambridgeshire, bringing the total number of arrests to 20.
Residents reported dozens of people wearing balaclavas driving 4x4s through Fenland villages and causing widespread damage to farmland on 25 January.
A 22-year-old man from Stourport-on-Severn, in Worcestershire, was arrested in Worcester on Tuesday, and three men, aged 18, 42 and 47 were arrested at their homes in Wellingborough, Northamptonshire on Wednesday.
All four remain in police custody in Peterborough. Sixteen men are on police bail until May.
